body_html: @znmeb What instructions are you following? Have you run clinfo? Have you run computecpp_info? Does that indicate that your OpenCL drivers are installed as expected? The instructions for Ubuntu 14.04 are here https://developer.codeplay.com/computecppce/latest/getting-started-with-tensflow and if you are using 16.04 there are some experimental instructions here http://deep-beta.co.uk/tensorflow-1-3-on-ubuntu-16-04-lts/

body: @znmeb What instructions are you following? Have you run clinfo? Have you run computecpp_info? Does that indicate that your OpenCL drivers are installed as expected? The instructions for Ubuntu 14.04 are here https://developer.codeplay.com/computecppce/latest/getting-started-with-tensflow and if you are using 16.04 there are some experimental instructions here http://deep-beta.co.uk/tensorflow-1-3-on-ubuntu-16-04-lts/
